page.title: 07Community Police Officer.
page.content: {P.C.Barton}is our Community Police Officer. That means that he patrols the area of Parsons Heath either on foot or on his bicycle. His main job is to get to know people and to investigate crimes within the area. For this he visits old peoples' flats and three primary schools, Roach Vale, St. Annes and Parsons Heath. He is also stopped by people whilst he is patrolling the area.In schools he talks to the chldren about his job, road safety and warns us not to go with strangers. He has his own office along Ipswich Road and enjoys doing his community work. This kind of work does interfere with his other police work and the hardest part of his job is to be patient with people who keep telephoning him with problems he cannot solve, almost wasting his time.
